biotools.summary: Display multiple-sequence alignment. The tool is also available as R/BioConductor interface to the multiple sequence alignment algorithms ClustalW, ClustalOmega, and Muscle. All three algorithms are integrated in the package, therefore, they do not depend on any external software tools and are available for all major platforms.

bioschemas.name: msa
